title: 仪容之三
description: 3 part ‘Jelenlét’ series by Jancso, from 1965 to 1986. Harmadik jelenlét ('The Third Presence') (1986) 13 min.

title: Aaron Rodgers: Enigma
description: Follows NFL quarterback Aaron Rodgers' comeback with the New York Jets and his life off the field, including his advocacy for ayahuasca, a psychedelic brew.

title: 与世界的最后一眼相遇
description: Chronicles a family's global trip before their children lose vision to a rare genetic disorder, capturing their journey to experience the world's beauty while they can still see it, and preparing for an inevitable future.

title: Lamas
description: Mona, a baker's daughter, feels trapped by her controlling father Adon. New employee Lina ignites Mona's desires. Adon has contrasting plans for Mona. Torn between duty and passion, Mona must decide her future path.
